name: backend-api
description: Production-ready Fastify backend API with TypeScript and comprehensive validation

scripts.test: cd ../.. && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' pnpm exec vitest run
scripts.test:watch: cd ../.. && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' pnpm exec vitest
scripts.test:coverage: cd ../.. && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' pnpm exec vitest run --coverage
scripts.test:workspace: cd ../.. && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' vitest run --reporter=json --outputFile=test-results/workspace-results.json apps/backend-api/test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:mutation-config: cd ../.. && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' vitest run -c vitest.mutation.config.ts --reporter=json --outputFile=test-results/mutation-results.json apps/backend-api/test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:verify-configs: cd ../.. && node -e "const w=require('./test-results/workspace-results.json');const m=require('./test-results/mutation-results.json');const fail=[];if(w.numTotalTests!==m.numTotalTests)fail.push('Total tests: '+w.numTotalTests+' vs '+m.numTotalTests);if(w.numPassedTests!==m.numPassedTests)fail.push('Passed tests: '+w.numPassedTests+' vs '+m.numPassedTests);if(w.numFailedTests!==m.numFailedTests)fail.push('Failed tests: '+w.numFailedTests+' vs '+m.numFailedTests);if(fail.length){console.error('❌ Config mismatch!\n'+fail.join('\n'));process.exit(1);}console.log('✅ Configs match: '+w.numTotalTests+' tests')"
